Commentaar: Section to group the gender, death and birth concepts. Sensitive demographic information on the patient (name, address, BSN number, etc.) should not be stored in an openEHR server.

ZIB_Verwijzing: Dit is een verwijzing naar het rootconcept in de sub-bouwsteen Naamgegevens.
Commentaar: Demographic data of a patient is not stored in openEHR.

Demographic data of a patient is not stored in openEHR.
Datetime pattern: year, optional month, day. A ‘vague’ date, such as only the year, is permitted.
We choose ‘Administrative gender’ over ‘Sex assigned at birth’ because the ZIB description for this variable is “Patient’s administrative gender”.
Other - OTH - NullFlavor is the only value without a SNOMED CT code.
Boolean not available, add a list of possible values (True or False).
Boolean not available, we used the internal coded text instead: at0005: Alive and at0006: Dead. For unknown value, possibility to add at0009: Unknown.
